name: 100-Point Champagne Dinner
location: James Suckling Wine Central, 22 Staunton Street #2nd floor Hong Kong, 00000
about: About This Event 活動介紹Join us for an unforgettable evening dedicated to the pinnacle of Champagne, hosted by JamesSuckling.com Staff Writer & Critic, Claire Nesbitt. She covers Champagne annually with James, and this exclusive dinner celebrates a selection of the region's iconic houses, culminating in a tasting of two perfect 100-point wines.From the purity of non-vintage Bruts to the mastery of multi-vintage blends and the prestige of legendary cuvées, this is a rare opportunity to explore the elegance, emotion, and precision that define the world's greatest sparkling wine. Claire will guide you through each flight, sharing insights from her tastings and reports on the Champagne region. Don't miss this chance to taste perfection.誠邀您參加由 JamesSuckling.com 記者兼酒評家 Claire Nesbitt 主持的香檳盛宴。這場獨家晚宴將聚焦香檳產區的頂級酒莊，呈獻一系列高分佳釀，更以兩款滿分100分的完美香檳作為壓軸，機會難得。從純淨無暇的無年份香檳、展現調配大師功藝的多年份香檳，到享負盛名的傳奇酒款，這場晚宴將帶您探索世界頂級氣泡酒的優雅、情感與精準。Claire 將引導您品鑑每一組酒款，分享她對香檳產區的深入見解。一場品味完美的極致體驗，正等待您的參與。Seats are limited to 24 people only. Reserve now to secure your spot.席位極為有限，敬請盡快預訂。

name: 2025香港咖啡師沖煮大賽冠軍分享會 HKBrC Champion Sharing Session
location: PMQ Taste Library 味道圖書館, H501-504, 5/F, Block B PMQ Hong Kong, HKI
about: 「沖煮，只是冰山一角。」- Bavis Kwong, Roastwork香港咖啡沖煮大賽冠軍Bavis Kwong於比賽中以「萃取金字塔」為概念，從拼配、研磨、預浸到沖煮都經過精心考量，只為呈現心中最完美的一杯咖啡。大家將有機會於7月17日(星期四)在PMQ Taste Library與冠軍會面，品嚐Bavis於比賽中使用的罕有Geisha拼配豆種，了解更多她獨有的沖煮方法、備戰過程以及由本地設計團隊Inputoutput Coffee與Naam Yu為比賽最新改良的Contour Drip設計理念。機會難逢！ 立即報名，跟隨Bavis的咖啡旅程，見證她的努力成果！“Brewing is just the tip of the iceberg.” — Bavis Kwong, RoastworkFresh off her victory as Hong Kong’s Brewers Cup champion, Bavis Kwong brought her "Extraction Pyramid" concept to life on the competition stage. From blending to grinding, blooming and brewing — every step was crafted to deliver the perfect cup of coffee.Join us for an unforgettable tasting event on July 17th (Thursday) at PMQ Taste Library, where Bavis from Roastwork will showcase her award-winning Geisha blend and share insights into her winning approach.Discover her coffee journey from creating a special brewing method and preparing for the competition, to utilising the latest modified version of the Contour Drip, a local design by passionate designer Naam Yu from Inputoutput Coffee.Don’t miss this rare opportunity to meet the champion and savor an award-winning exclusive blend!日期 Date：2025.7.17（Thu）時間 Time：7:00 - 8:00pm場地 Venue：PMQ 味道圖書館（H504, Block B, PMQ, 35 Aberdeen Street）嘉賓 Guest：Bavis Kwong（2025香港咖啡沖煮大賽冠軍 HKBrC 2025 Champion)語言 Language：廣東話 Cantonese費用 Fee：HK$380名額 Quota：10人（名額有限，先到先得 Limited seats on a first-come-first-served basis）主辦 Organiser：PMQ Coffee Agenda x Bavis Kwong備註 Remarks:1. 完成報名登記的人士，即表示已閱覽及同意報名程序、條款及細則，以及惡劣天氣安排。By completing the enrollment, you agree that you have read and agreed to the enrollment procedures, terms and conditions, and inclement weather arrangements.2. 此工作坊將以廣東話進行。This workshop will be conducted in Cantonese.3. 如有任何爭議，PMQ元創方保留最終決定權。In case of any dispute, the decision of PMQ is final.

name: Gok3choco X 河背農圃 —— 手工朱古力工作坊
location: 香港有機生活發展基金, 八鄉河背村66號 元朗, NT
about: 🌱 從泥土到舌尖👅走進河背農圃，用雙手採摘在地食材，即場試食新鮮蔬果 x 手工朱古力的味覺 crossover，品嚐新鮮、香甜的真正食物滋味！參加者可嘗試用本地農產果乾 —— 火龍果 + 過山香蕉果乾作配料，加入手工製作的生朱古力，創作出只屬於「香港土地風味」的朱古力。🌾 認識「生朱古力」🌾Gok3choco 主理人分享朱古力的原料及製作過程，可親手觸摸可可豆、品嚐空運可可果及生朱古力原材料，了解什麼是「生朱古力」 —— 以低溫處理保留可可豆的天然營養，味道層次豐富，口感綿密，避免因高溫產生過酸或過苦的味道，更接近食物的自然狀態。難得一見的 crossover 體驗，以中西食材碰撞，用心感受每一口純粹、天然的滋味！活動詳情🗓️ 日期：2025年7月20日（星期日）⏰ 時間：上午10:00 - 下午1:00📍 地點：元朗河背農圃👥 人數：限15人活動體驗🚜 農田導賞 → 了解本地農產及有機種植🍓 親手採摘新鮮時令在地農產食材x手工朱古力crossover 味蕾體驗🍫 學習製作無添加生朱古力 x 本地火龍果、過山香蕉乾→ Gok3choco 主理人親自教學📝 分享朱古力原材料 → 認識「生朱古力」🤤 即場試食/帶走 → 港式食材 × 西式朱古力的fusion驚喜報名費用單人體驗：$280 （只限12歲以上）親子體驗：$450 （一位成人及一位小童只限12歲或以下）

name: Champagne Tribaut x Aroma Wine Bistro| MyiCellar 雲窖
location: Aroma Wine Bistro, 2樓206-210號舖 新寧道1號利園三期 銅鑼灣, HKI
about: 活動介紹 Event information |探索五代傳承香檳莊園的匠心之作Discover the Art of Champagne Tribaut SchloesserTribaut Schloesser 是五代傳承的家族酒莊，專注於釀造兼具細膩與個性的香檳。以風土為本，堅持長時間陳釀，從果香明亮的 Origine Brut 到層次豐富的 Blanc de Chardonnay Extra Brut，每款皆展現香檳的優雅與深度。位於銅鑼灣的 Aroma Wine Bistro向來是美食與葡萄酒愛好者必到訪之地，這場晚宴我們精選了五款 Tribaut Schloesser 香檳：百搭的 Origine Brut、清爽的 Premier Cru Extra Brut、優雅的 Blanc de Chardonnay、長時間陳年的 Cuvée René，以及活潑的 8 Terroirs Rosé，搭配經典Bistro菜式，讓美酒與佳餚相得益彰。Tribaut Schloesser is a fifth-generation family estate dedicated to crafting Champagnes of finesse and character. With a terroir-driven approach and extended aging, their range showcases elegance and depth - from the fruit-forward Origine Brut to the complex Blanc de Chardonnay Extra Brut.Nestled in the heart of Causeway Bay, Aroma Wine Bistro is a beloved destination for food and wine enthusiasts. For this special dinner, we've selected five Tribaut Schloesser Champagnes: the versatile Origine Brut, crisp Premier Cru Extra Brut, elegant Blanc de Chardonnay, aged Cuvée René, and vibrant 8 Terroirs Rosé, perfectly paired with classic Bistro fare.

name: Discovering the Flavors of Vegan Thai Cuisine: A Private Cooking Class
dateTime: Yew Chung College of Early Childhood Education
location: 葵芳, Room K2, 24/F, Block 1 Goldfield Industrial Building 144 -150 Tai Lin Pai Road, NT
about: Embark on a culinary adventure with our exclusive private class, "Discovering the Flavors of Vegan Thai Cuisine," designed for individuals or small groups eager to learn the secrets of traditional Thai cooking while embracing a plant-based lifestyle.In this intimate cooking experience, you'll have the opportunity to work closely with Chef Tina, a talented chef who specializes in vegan Thai cuisine. Together, you'll discover essential Thai cooking techniques, including how to balance flavors, the importance of presentation, and tips for sourcing the best ingredients. You will also gain insights into the health benefits of a vegan diet and how to incorporate more plant-based meals into your everyday life.During this 3-hour class, you will experience how to make a variety of traditional Thai dishes using fresh, local ingredients. Chef Tina will guide you through the process of creating mouthwatering dishes like:Vegan Coconut Mushroom SoupVegan Green Papaya SaladVegan Curry PasteTempeh or mushroom Tofu curryAfter cooking, you can enjoy the delightful dishes you’ve prepared together! Share stories, savor the flavors, and connect with your fellow culinary enthusiasts in a warm and inviting atmosphere. This dining experience is the perfect way to celebrate your culinary creations and enjoy a meal that reflects the rich tapestry of Thai culture.Whether you're a beginner or an experienced cook, this class caters to all skill levels.

You can experience the hand-drip process by Blue Bottle Coffee brewing tools and experience the same delicious coffee at the Blue Bottle Coffee cafe.◎ Class Agenda- Blue Bottle Coffee Brand Introduction- Blue Bottle Coffee Hand-drip Brewing Kit introduction- Coffee Beans introduction- Hand-drip demonstration by barista- Experience and Q&A sessionWe will have all brewing kits ready for you so that you do not need to prepare anything for the class, after school, you will get complimentary bag of coffee beans (200g) selected by the barista and The Art of Pour Over brewing guide to allow you to try out with our new knowledge at home.Save your spot.*The 75-minute course is mainly Cantonese-speaking.*Full payment for the registration and no refund or rescheduling.Blue Bottle Coffee shall notify participants for special arrangement for any inclement weatherPlease follow instagram @BlueBottleCoffeeHongKong for latest update

name: Foodie Adventure in Hong Kong Old Central
location: Sheung Wan MTR Exit E2 (Street Level), 上环站 中环, HKI
about: Join us on this foodie adventure led by a friendly local guide through the vibrant heart of Hong Kong – Old Central, to taste the most authentic traditional Hong Kong cuisine. Within 3 hours, you’ll explore old buildings, ride the city’s oldest transport, and best of all, taste the mouth-watering street food and drinks Hong Kong is famous for.Tour Availability: DailyMeeting Point: Sheung Wan Exit E2 (Street Level)Duration: 15:00 – 18:00 (approximately 3 hours)Group Size: Max. 15 participantsHighlights:Taste a range of signature dim sum, including Har Gau (crystal shrimp dumpling), Siu Mai (pork and shrimp dumpling), water chestnut cake, and even chicken feet!Try the exclusive Hong Kong street food, like the egg waffle, egg tart, and a refreshing local herbal tea.Dine in a typical Cha Chaan Teng, a Hong Kong-style cafe, and enjoy local favorites like French toast, silk stocking milk tea, and Yuen Yeung (tea and coffee mix).Walk into the antique market and Man Mo Temple, digesting your food with a walk through historical heritages.Enjoy the Michelin commanded Wonton noodles as a finish.

name: 【文化沙龍】劉偉民 Ronny Lau《意大利酒王 Barolo 白松露菌味覺顛峰之旅》暨試酒環節
location: 旅遊研究所 - 旺角中華漆廠大廈 6 樓, 旺角廣東道1163號 中華漆廠大廈 6 樓 Mong Kok, KOW
about: 【文化沙龍】劉偉民 Ronny Lau《意大利酒王 Barolo 白松露菌味覺顛峰之旅》暨試酒環節文化沙龍詳情：日期：2025-07-22 （二)時間：1900-2030地點：旺角廣東道1163號中華漆廠大廈 6 樓內容簡介：Barolo被譽為「酒中王」，以其卓越的陳年能力和嚴格的監管聞名。2014年，Barolo和Barbaresco的葡萄園被UNESCO列入世界文化遺產。白松露菌則因難以培植和短暫的收成期，被稱為餐桌上的鑽石，主要產於意大利的Alba，每年吸引來自世界各地美食家慕名而去。酒評人Ronny 與大家細味他多年來穿梭於意大利的試酒及美饌經歷，探索葡萄酒與風土人情和歷史文化的微妙關係，以及特別分享葡萄酒主題旅遊享用酒王及白松露的色香味體驗。現場品試 Barolo 及 Barbaresco，感受酒王及酒后魅力。劉偉民 Ronny Lau：香港酒評人協會創會主席，前大中華酒評人協會主席。八十年代開始撰寫酒評，著有《傾倒葡萄酒》等及主編葡萄酒書。2011年起出任上海國際葡萄酒品評賽聯合主席至今。2012 年獲意大利酒莊邀請釀酒，成為首個 Super Tuscan 華人釀酒師。2016 年獲意大利對外貿易委員會邀請設計及於內地任教《意大利葡萄酒及烈酒課程》。2022 年獲意大利商務專員公署邀請設計及主持「意酒中菜」中國 8 大菜系晚宴系列。🌟行程亮點‧意大利葡萄酒達人 Ronny Lau 全程嚮導‧ 參觀多家 Barolo 明星酒莊 每餐精選葡萄酒配搭‧ 兩家米芝蓮星餐廳用膳 享用三餐白松露菜式‧ 藝術家指導葡萄酒繪畫班 咖啡及朱古力博物館‧ 參觀耶穌裹屍布博物館 都靈城市漫遊‧ 歐洲最大 Shopping Outlet 血拚【意大利酒王Barolo白松露味覺顛峰之旅】📅日期：2025 年 11 月 15 日（六）至 11 月 22 日（六）（米蘭集合）📝團號：EXTITMXP202511A*凡於 7 月 25 日或之前報名，並繳交 HKD 5,000 作為留位費，可享團費每位減 HKD $1,000 早鳥優惠。‧若對最終團費或行程內容有異議，參加者可選擇退出並全數退還已繳款項。‧如有任何爭議，一期旅研保留最終解釋及決定權。🔥🔥🔥本團現正接受報名 🔥🔥🔥🌿機會難逢 名額有限 額滿即止！🌿如欲報名，請 WhatsApp 6618 3022 與旅行社職員接洽🌿或致電 2713 0998 查詢🌿或電郵至 info@extravelism.com旅遊研究所｜Extravelism旅行社牌照號碼：354367https://www.instagram.com/extravelism/

DM/call us at africacenter.hongkong@gmail.com or +852 9260 6185 for any inquiries.Date: 18th July 2025 (Fri)Time: 12:00-1:00 pmVenue: 8/F, Breakthrough Centre, 191 Woosung Street, Jordan, KowloonAfrica Center 為你呈獻「非洲版三餸飯」（fufu版）。fufu係非洲人嘅精神主糧，相當於我們的米飯，佢哋都係每餐無「Fu」不歡㗎！不過佢係以玉米或芋頭等材料製造，口感好特別，再配埋3種不同嘅非洲國家菜式撈「Fu」食，包你食唔停口。日子: 18th July 2025 (Fri)時間：12:00-1:00pm地址：九龍佐敦吳松街191號突破中心8樓請聯絡africacenter.hongkong@gmail.com/ +852 9260 6185 查詢。

name: 明廚 x 珍酒晚宴 | Myicellar 雲窖
location: 明廚, 地下G8-11號舖 堅拿道西15號永德大廈 銅鑼灣, HKI
about: 活動介紹 Event information |旺角13年人氣老店銅鑼灣新店多款獨創新派海鮮菜式From Mong Kok’s beloved original to a fresh Causeway Bay locationClassic seafood dishes reimagined明廚老店扎根於旺⾓13年，主打獨樹⼀幟的港式海鮮美食，以嚴選新鮮、優質的食材及精湛技藝⾒稱，深受本地及海外食客喜愛。銅鑼灣店以Artdeco懷舊風格作為靈感，裝潢復古典雅，更是在傳統菜式上加添創意，推出多款獨創新派菜式。搭配優質醬香型白酒【貴州珍酒】，其浓郁酱香、醇厚口感和悠长余味將食材原有的鮮味進⼀步昇華，帶給您一場令味蕾流連忘返的美食美酒體驗。Ming Kitchen is renowned for its unique Hong Kong-style seafood cuisine using only the freshest, premium ingredients. Its masterful culinary techniques have also won the hearts of both local and international diners.The new Causeway Bay branch features elegant retro decor. While staying true to classic flavors, it also introduces a range of innovative seafood dishes.Paired with the premium Zhenjiu — an aromatic baijiu with a mellow taste and long-lasting finish — the natural umami of the ingredients is further elevated, delivering an unforgettable gourmet experience.

name: 唐閣 x 珍酒晚宴 | MyiCellar 雲窖
location: 唐閣, 香港朗廷酒店1樓及2樓 北京道8號 尖沙咀, KOW
about: 活動介紹 Event information |位於香港朗廷酒店的粵菜食府唐閣，一直堅持選用最新鮮及上乘的食材入饌，匠心製作出頂級粵菜佳餚。餐廳裝潢以金色為主，配以上好的絲綢、古典的螺旋樓梯及牆壁上的現代雕刻，一顯唐代古典優雅的氣息。開業三十餘年，蟬聯米芝蓮三星多年，實力可見一斑。搭配中國醬香型白酒主要品牌、四大國宴用酒之一的貴州珍酒，其悠長的醬香讓味覺體驗更加豐富，更有融入珍酒烹調的招牌菜式XO醬爆炒乳龍蝦，在格調高雅的環境中，讓您能細意品嚐一場難忘的粵菜美酒體驗。T’ang Court, the esteemed Cantonese restaurant at The Langham, Hong Kong, has always adhered to the philosophy of using only the freshest and finest ingredients to craft exceptional Cantonese cuisine. The restaurant’s opulent gold-toned interiors, adorned with luxurious silks, a grand spiral staircase, and contemporary wall carvings, evoke the classical elegance of the Tang Dynasty. For over three decades, T’ang Court has consistently held the prestigious Michelin three-star rating—a testament to its culinary excellence.Paired with Zhenjiu, one of China’s premier sauce-aroma baijiu brands and a staple of national banquets, the liquor’s lingering, complex aroma elevates the dining experience. Signature dishes like Stir-Fried Baby Lobster in XO Sauce, infused with Zhenjiu, further showcase this harmony. In an ambiance of refined grandeur, guests are invited to savor an unforgettable symphony of Cantonese flavors and premium baijiu.

about: 活動介紹 Event information |位於宮城縣仙台市的勝山酒造創立於西元 1688 年，是伊達家的「御用酒造」，先祖是伊達家的家臣，一直秉持著先代傳下來的伊達家家訓營業至今。勝山酒造不僅是傳統的日本酒造，他們的作品一直很努力很努力的「現代化」，作品曾獲頂級酒評家 Robert Parker 青睞 95 高分！睇圖仿佛已經被果香🍍🍌🍈🍊🍇包圍，垂涎欲滴，令人想一探究竟！

name: ORGANIC HILL WINE DINNER ️
location: The Victuals, 99 Hennessy Road #3/F Wan Chai, HKI
about: ORGANIC HILL WINE DINNER 🍷🍽️🥩🎤Guest Speaker Leon HillFounder of Organic HillOrganic Hill was a creation that was born from all facets of Leon's experience gained in over twenty years in the Wine Industry. The creation of Organic Hill was personal, it was health conscious, it was me.Leon's Organic wine journey began personally back in 2009 when he realised that he was Gluten intolerant (not Coeliac) and needed to find Gluten free products. This led him to discover the myriad of Organic shops located in and around Melbourne, many of which also sold Organic wine.  After lots of trial and error searching for a solution to my intolerances, it became obvious that it was also Preservatives that I was allergic to, therefore Organic simply made sense.=====📅 31/07/2025 (Thursday)🕗 19:30🏠 The Victuals3/F, Bayfield Building, 99 Hennessy Road, Wan Chai💰 $980 (4 Courses Menu)🍽️Sous Vide Watermelon with Tiger Prawns🍽️Pan Seared Matsusaka Pork Toro🍽️Dry Aged Beef Cannelloni🍽️Grilled Greekstone Prime Ribeye🍷Paired with 6 glasses of Australian Organic Wine and a cult red wine worth $1380 per bottle=====Little Bit More About Organic Hill Wines~Organic Hill Winemaker - Matt Wenk⭐Former chief winemaker for Two Hands Wines (2002 - 2013)⭐A fact that is largely unknown Matt remains the only winemaker in the world to have wines of his making in internationally acclaimed Wine Spectator top 100 for 10 consecutive years.

name: 如 x 中國佳釀晚宴 | MyiCellar 雲窖
location: 如, 荃灣西如心酒店7樓 楊屋道8號 荃灣, HKI
about: 活動介紹 Event information |「如」以傳統中菜精髓糅合時尚優雅，堅持使用本地上乘食材及正宗烹調手法，演繹出一系列備受喜愛的時令滋味，並致力實踐可持續發展的飲食概念及傳承中菜的深厚文化。在這場匠心獨運的晚宴中，我們特別呈獻國宴級醬香型白酒「貴州珍酒」及源自雲南海拔2600米純淨高原的「香格里拉葡萄酒」。10道精緻美饌與6款佳釀相互輝映，讓您體驗粵式美饌與中國佳釀的魅力。RÚ celebrates authentic Chinese culinary arts in tasteful modern elegance. Reimagined by our master chefs, classic Cantonese specialities are turned into award-winning dishes with vibrant seasonal flavours. With a commitment to sustainability, ingredients are sourced locally and prepared authentically as an ode to the preservation of our environment and culture.At this exquisitely crafted dinner, we are proud to present Kweichow Zhenjiu, a national-banquet-grade sauce-aroma baijiu, and Shangri-La Wines, sourced from Yunnan plateau at an elevation of 2,600 meters. Ten exquisite dishes and six fine wines will complement each other, allowing you to experience the charm of Cantonese delicacies paired with China’s finest beverages.

name: Farm-to-Table Pizza Making & Vertical Farm Tour 「種子直送餐桌」手工薄餅製作 與 智能水耕農場導覽
location: SEED by Farmacy, 100 Cyberport Road Arcade Hong kong, HKI
about: Hands-on Pizza making: Learn to make your own original pizza using hand-stretched sourdough dough, premium tomatoes, fresh Farmacy-grown basil, and fior di latte mozzarella.Vertical Farm Tour: Explore the only farm-to-table concept in Hong Kong with a guided tour of the vertical farm.Harvest your own herbs: Pick fresh basil leaves directly from the farm to use on your pizza.Terms & Conditions:◾ Advance booking required; no walk-ins.◾ Non-refundable, non-transferable.◾ Present confirmation message upon arrival.◾ Photos/videos may be used for promotional purposes.◾ Event cancelled if Typhoon Signal No. 8+ or Black Rainstorm Warning is hoisted; full refunds issued.◾ SEED by Farmacy reserves the right to amend terms.- 親手製作薄餅：學習使用手工拉伸的酸種麵團、優質番茄、新鮮種植的羅勒和義大利迷你水牛芝士製作屬於自己的原創披薩。- 智能水耕農場導覽：透過智能水耕農場導覽，探索香港唯一的「種子直送餐桌」概念。- 親手採摘香草：直接從農場採摘新鮮羅勒葉，用於您的手工薄餅上。條款及細則：◾ 門票有限，必須預約，即日walk-in恕不接待◾ 門票不可轉讓及退換，購買後恕不退款◾ 每位參加者需於到場時出示確認訊息◾ 活動期間將進行拍攝，照片或作日後本餐廳社交平台及網站宣傳用途◾ 如活動當日懸掛八號或以上風球/黑色暴雨警告，活動將取消並不作另行通知，受影響參加者可獲全額退款◾ SEED by Farmacy 保留修改條款及細則之權利

name: Vegetarian Food and Cultural Tour
location: Kowloon, Pei ho street Sham Shui Po, KOW
about: Join us on our revamped Vegetarian Food tour for 2024. All food is included in the experience.Hong Kong’s global culinary scene beckons, and for those seeking plant-based delights, our Grass Routes Vegetarian Food Tour is the answer. Join Hong Kong Greeters on a meticulously crafted journey, seamlessly fusing a lesser-known local neighbourhood with delectable vegetarian treats. From a classic breakfast at a local cha chaan teng to savouring iconic street snacks like Cheung faan, bakery delights, and refreshing beverages, prepare to indulge in a morning feast that celebrates both the city’s rich culture and vibrant vegetarian culinary scene.Vegan-friendly too!Inclusions:Expertly led by a licensed guide and self-confessed foodieIndulge in the delicious and humble flavours with five food stopsHosted in EnglishVegetarian Tour Itinerary:Cha Chaan Teng: Immerse yourself in a local breakfast spot, your one-stop-shop for all the delicious vegetarian Chinese breakfast items.Seasonal fruits (optional): Discover some of the sweetest Asian delights at a local fruit stand.Kung Wo Beancurd Factory: This restaurant has been around for over 100 years for a reason! Let your guide chose some of the best variety of products to try, and take a look at how the beancurd is made in the back kitchen.Cheung Faan Delight: Another local and fully vegetarian favourite – spice up this humble dish with a variety of saucesKing of Drinks: The most refreshing local drink made on the spot just for youPlus a few more local surprises in store for you.*Children must be accompanied by an adult

name: Japanese Whisky Tasting: From Pioneers to Modern Innovators 私人團體日本威士忌品鑑

Experience a curated tasting that brings to life the spirit of Japan’s forests, mountains, and craftsmanship, all unfolding beautifully in your glass.「日本之旅：Mizunara導賞威士忌品嚐之旅」是一場獨特的探索，將品嚐六款卓越的日本威士忌。從開創性的傳統到現代創新，每一款威士忌都揭示了其釀酒廠靈魂的獨特故事。體驗這場精心策劃的品嚐，將日本的森林、山脈和工藝精神生動地展現在您的酒杯中。Event DetailsThis event is exclusively for your peers group.What's Included: Tasting of 6 whiskies (15ml each) and snacksDuration: 90 minutesCapacity: 10 peopleVenue Options:1702, 17/F, Sun Hing Industrial Building, 46 Wong Chuk Hang Rd, Wong Chuk HangAlternative venue available for an additional charge活動詳情此活動僅限於 您的同儕團體。包含內容： 6款威士忌品嚐及小吃時長： 90分鐘人數： 10人場地選擇香港黃竹坑黃竹坑道46號，順興工業大廈17樓1702室另有額外收費的替代場地可選Whisky Lineup Preview 威士忌品嚐預覽1️. name: SEED FARMERS MARKET 耔籽農墟
dateTime: Intertek Testing Services Hong Kong Ltd.
location: 中環七號天星碼頭, 民光街 中環, HKI
about: 2008年1月9日，SEED主辦的「中環天星碼頭農墟」正式誕生，現已改名為「SEED 耔籽農墟」。作為唯一一個平日固定農墟，有別於其他假日農墟，我們聚集的小農戶多以小量生產，精品蔬菜為主，不乏別具特色的有機蔬菜、加工農產等。農墟堅持保持簡單、直接、充滿濃濃人情味的運作方式，讓農夫與市民能夠互動交流，讓每位農夫的聲音也能夠被聽見。營運至今，由數個農場開始，現已發展成擁有十多個農場及本地小店的固定農墟，更吸引新晉農青參與，更與不同農場、機構及團體合作，衍生出多元化的社區項目。
